string-array.name: language_exchange_rules
string-array.item: Respect and Courtesy: Treat all users with respect and courtesy.
Clear Communication: Clearly communicate your language learning goals.
Commitment to Learning: Dedicate time and effort to language practice.
Language Practice: Focus on the language being learned during sessions.
Feedback: Provide constructive feedback; receive it gracefully.
Privacy and Safety: Respect each others privacy.
Cultural Sensitivity: Be aware and respectful of cultural differences.
Conflict Resolution: Address conflicts respectfully; seek assistance if needed.
Appropriate Content: Refrain from sharing inappropriate or offensive content.
Respect Boundaries: Honor personal boundaries and avoid sensitive topics.
Report Misconduct: Report any user that violate rules.
